ModMetaData.name: Surgery Never Fail
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
如果你还在使用S/L大法来确保手术的成功率，这个MOD很适合你。本MOD将确保手术永远成功。 If you are still using the Save/Load to ensure the success rate of surgeries, this MOD is perfect for you. This mod will guarantee surgery never fail.
进入游戏右下角有个手术的图标，默认启用，启用时手术永远成功，禁用时使用原版代码 There's a toggle surgery icon at the bottom right after entering the game. It is enabled by default, meaning surgery never fail. You can disable it to use the vanilla behaviours.
本模组使用的图标来自flaticon： https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/surgery Surgery icons created by Iconjam - Flaticon The icon used in the mod is from flaticon: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/surgery Surgery icons created by Iconjam - Flaticon
